articles.title: Articles Archive temporarily suspended due to high usage
articles.content:
#Update #Notice #Important
Our articles archive website is currently offline due to high usage. It will be back online after 24h when the usage returns to normal. This is not due to a SCAM or any illegal activities!

Visit us on https://articles.22web.org.

articles.title: 🔧 Deposit BNB to platform disabled
articles.content: Due to the BNB API stopped and the etherscan API heavily used at the moment we can no longer give WorkTokens for depositing BNB to the platform. No guide available.

articles.title: 💱 WTK and WorkTHR are our primary tokens
articles.content: We’ve officially transitioned from WorkTH (mintme chain) to WorkTHR & WTK (BNB chain) as our primary reward and valuation token. Mining, trading, and platform credit logic now reflects WTK WorkTHR. Learn how to trade WTK & WorkTHR.

articles.title: Users can use our speed test for free
articles.content: The speed test will not use WorkTokens. Try it now..

articles.title: We are working on an ESP8266 miner
articles.content: We are working on an ESP8266 mining system but that project is not with a certain outcome. If we find a good proof & usefulness for the ESP project it will go to alpha stage, otherwise it will be discontinued. No guide available.
